flowRoot.flowPara: "If the time is at least 05:30 GMT on 2016 Jan 15, and the input contains a value and a valid signature from a given oracle, then distribute the funds between user 1 and user 2 based on the value provided byu the oracle"

"You should give me 15 coins and give U2 5 coins, and here's a cryptographic proof saying that a piece of data that I have, if applied as an input to the code that you have the hash of, will tell you to make that exact distribution"
